```{r}
i=6
j=2

cd<-"Control"
CD<-"W1"

#X_set <- list(genome, grm, met, mic, mir, cbind(genome,mic), cbind(genome,mir))
X_names <- c("genome","grm","metabolome", "micro_c", "micro_r","genome micro_c","genome micro_r")
#Y_set <- list(pheno,met)
Y_names <- c("phenotype","metabolome")
PY<-readRDS(here("out","Soy",cd,paste0("Pred_X=", X_names[i], "Y=", Y_names[j],cd,"gm2019_LOO_meta_3k.RDS")))

predmet <- PY$pred_Yall
saveRDS(predmet,here("out","Soy",cd,"predmmet_gmicro_rda.RDS"))


rda<-readRDS(here("out","Soy",cd,"cor_gm2019_LOO_meta_3k.RDS"))
accu_rda<-t(rda)
colnames(accu_rda)<- c("G_RDA", "Micro_RDA", "G+Micro_RDA")
```
